para.sentence: The upper signs correspond to {\mathrm{M}^{(3)}_{\nu}}\left(z,h\right) and the lower signs to {\mathrm{M}^{(4)}_{\nu}}\left(z,h\right).

The expansion (28.25.1) is valid for {\mathrm{M}^{(3)}_{\nu}}\left(z,h\right) when \Re z\to+\infty, if -\pi+\delta\leq\operatorname{ph}h+\Im z\leq 2\pi-\delta, and for {\mathrm{M}^{(4)}_{\nu}}\left(z,h\right) when \Re z\to+\infty, if -2\pi+\delta\leq\operatorname{ph}h+\Im z\leq\pi-\delta, where \delta again denotes an arbitrary small positive constant.
For proofs and generalizations see Meixner and Schäfke (1954, §2.63).
